Bash(git -C "c:\\OldD\\_Projects\\Healthy" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add biomarker canonical name normalization at import time

- Add canonical_name column to TestResult model for storing normalized names
- Normalize biomarker names at all 4 import points \(documents, users, scheduler\)
- Update dashboard endpoints to use stored canonical_name when available
- Add admin endpoints for biomarker mapping management:
  - GET /admin/biomarker-mappings - view all canonical mappings
  - GET /admin/biomarker-stats - normalization statistics
  - POST /admin/run-biomarker-migration - migrate existing records
- Add migration script: backend_v2/migrations/add_canonical_name.py

This ensures consistent biomarker grouping across different providers
\(Regina Maria, Synevo\) who use different names for the same tests.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "c:\\OldD\\_Projects\\Healthy" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix XServer/Xvfb error misclassification as wrong password

- Add server_error category to error classifier for XServer/display issues
- Shows "Server Maintenance" message instead of misleading password error
- Add serverError/serverErrorDesc translations in RO/EN
- Add server_error to Dashboard and LinkedAccounts error mappings
- Use blue Server icon for this error type

This prevents XServer issues during server restarts from being shown
as authentication failures to users.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "c:\\OldD\\_Projects\\Healthy" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix null error_type handling and XServer error interpretation

- Dashboard: Handle null error_type by defaulting to ''unknown''
- Admin: Add XServer/display errors to interpret_sync_error function
- Check for XServer errors BEFORE password errors in both classifiers

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(git -C "c:\\OldD\\_Projects\\Healthy" add backend_v2/routers/users.py frontend_v2/src/pages/LinkedAccounts.jsx frontend_v2/src/locales/ro.json frontend_v2/src/locales/en.json tasks.md)

Bash(git -C "c:\\OldD\\_Projects\\Healthy" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Auto-retry sync after user updates credentials

When a user updates credentials for an account that was in ERROR state:
- Reset error status \(status, error_type, consecutive_failures\)
- Automatically trigger a sync in the background
- Show user feedback that sync has started

This improves UX by not requiring users to manually click sync after
fixing their password.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "c:\\OldD\\_Projects\\Healthy" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix admin service status - use correct service name

- Changed service name from ''healthy'' to ''healthy-api'' in:
  - /admin/service-status endpoint
  - /admin/restart-server endpoint
- Also disabled old duplicate healthy.service on server

The old healthy.service was in a restart loop causing confusion.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(powershell -Command "cd ''c:\\OldD\\_Projects\\Healthy''; git commit -m ''Disable rate limiting in test environment

Rate limiter was causing test failures by blocking multiple registrations

rate limiting when running tests.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>''")

Bash(powershell -Command "cd ''c:\\OldD\\_Projects\\Healthy''; git add backend_v2/auth/security.py; git commit -m ''Use bcrypt directly instead of passlib

passlib 1.7.4 has compatibility issues with bcrypt 5.x. Using bcrypt
directly avoids these issues and simplifies the code.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>''; git push origin main")
